ForearmsLVSeatedSupination.name: Lever Seated Forearm Supination
ForearmsLVSeatedSupination.preparation: Sit on seat. Grasp rotating handles with overhand grip on each side and place forearms on pads.
ForearmsLVSeatedSupination.execution: Rotate shafts by turning palm upward. Return and repeat.
ForearmsLVSeatedSupination.comments: Depending on participants range of motion and machines design, handles may need to be prerotated so resistance is present throughout movement, particularly initial phase of rotation. See forearm supination up close.

ForearmsLVSupination.name: Lever Standing Forearm Supination
ForearmsLVSupination.preparation: Grasp open handle at end of shaft with overhand grip.
ForearmsLVSupination.execution: Rotate shaft by turning palm upward. Return and repeat.
ForearmsLVSupination.comments: Depending on participants range of motion and machines design, handle may need to be prerotated so resistance is present throughout movement, particularly initial phase of rotation.
